channel.title: Haade
channel.description: Home Assistance Alsace home automation & electronics.

item.title: Z-wave 800 Long stores the bottom of the z-wave
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
I will detail the latest z-wave 800 protocol and take stock of this protocol and the association modes, with the latest shelly modules for testing on a Zooz ZST39 controller.

This is another article that is close to my heart, the Z-wave protocol is coming back to the forefront. Silabs has decided to change things, module prices are finally accessible, manufacturers are starting to produce modules integrating the latest protocol again.

Read the full article: Z-wave 800 Long stores the bottom of the z-wave on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: High-performance and inexpensive multi-service NAS and Proxmox
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Short tutorials how to make a cheap used multi-disk NAS thanks to Amazon renewed and install a proxmox VM server for OMV or TrueNAS with HomeAssistant OS and Frigate NVR

You will find on the internet several ways of performing NAS based on mini-PCs but for a performance equivalent to the Intel i5 or i7 the prices can quickly skyrocket. This type of tutorial is not the first on the web but I will offer you a simple way to [...]

Read the full article: High-performance and inexpensive multi-service NAS and Proxmox on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Testing the Z-Station Z-wave>me multi-protocol USB adapter
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
I am going to test this dongle referenced ZMEEZSTATION_ZW_ZB from the Z-Wave brand>me the Z-station USB adapter and see if it meets the opensource requirements Zigbee2mqtt and ZwaveJS UI among others

A small exclusive on the web, and yes I am one of the first to test the new superhero dongle from the ZWAVE>ME brand, the multiprotocol USB adapter on Z-STATION - ZMEEZSTATION_ZW_ZB compatible Zigbee/Z-wave/Thread/matter and even Bluetooth. So when I say the first I’m talking in France and in reference [...]

Read the full article: Testing the Z-Station Z-wave>me multi-protocol USB adapter on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Take full advantage of your FREE fiber optic subscription
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Fiber subscriptions are becoming more and more powerful and yet most of us do not use this bandwidth because our home network is equipped to use only 1Gbit/s, so how to best use your freebox ultra

Ah, I finally switched to fiber by Free at my home which announces a bandwidth of 8Gbit/s for downloading and sending data, no less. But there you go my current network only outputs 1Gbit/s on all the switches. Taking a closer look at the national results nperf I realized given [...]

Read the full article: Take full advantage of your FREE fiber optic subscription on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Sonoff Pow Ring POWCT energy meter review
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
New intelligent energy meter on the market, the Sonoff Pow Ring POWCT offers external energy measurement, a digital display, a remote wifi antenna which can make the most of its energy consumption

Today I have the chance to test the 100A intelligent energy meter, the Sonoff Pow ring POWCT, this is not the first Sonoff meter that I have tested, there is some time I was able to test the pow elite 16A and integrate it with SonoffLAN, moreover I repeated the [...]

Read the full article: Sonoff Pow Ring POWCT energy meter review on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: August & Nicole test the Tedee Go lock for you
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
Will August hold back and not blow anything up? Nicole has no interest in keeping an eye on things, especially since he came home completely drunk that morning!

Following an evening that was too watered, August came home completely drunk. Fortunately, the Tedee lock was installed, he did not need to insert the key in the lock and without the slightest difficulty he opened the door using his smartphone.

Read the full article: August & Nicole test the Tedee Go lock for you on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: The Domodays
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Domodays are back from May 28 to June 3!

Take advantage of a week full of great deals with discounts of up to 25% on a wide selection of home automation brands.

Read the full article: The Domodays on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Tedee and the Cloud portal
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Tutorials on using the Tedee portal for managing several connected locks Tedee Go and Pro ideal when you have several locks or for accommodation and concierge professionals

After a brief presentation of the Tedee GO connected lock and integration via the Smartphone application, I suggest you deepen your knowledge through more complete data management of Tedee connected locks thanks to the cloud of the brand and management via through the web portal.

Read the full article: Tedee and the Cloud portal on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Discovery of SMLIGHT remote dongles
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
SMLight provides us with a complete range of remote and very complete Zigbee coordinators/dongles, simplified installation, a web interface and all Zigbee2mqtt and ZHA compatible.

I am lucky enough to be able to present to you part of the SMlight range from the Ukrainian manufacturer of Zigbee/Matter coordinators. You’ve certainly heard about it, the company is currently pulling out all the stops in terms of communication and is there anything to listen for?

Read the full article: Discovery of SMLIGHT remote dongles on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Test and integration of the Blebox Doorbox v2 module
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
In this article I will present to you the micro wifi doorbox v2 module from Blebox NO/NC for garage door, gate as well as the integration into the Tedee and Home Assistant application

Following the article on the Tedee GO connected lock. The manufacturer Tedee also provided me with a relay module doorbox v2, it is a NO/NC module from the Blebox brand. Polish manufacturer of micro wifi module, I must admit that they are qualitative and there is rather interest because it [...]

Read the full article: Test and integration of the Blebox Doorbox v2 module on the blog Haade.fr.
